title: The Penny Parker Megapack: 15 Complete Novels
description: This volume assembled 15 complete novels by Mildred A. Wirt (writing as Mildred Benson). A rival to the Nancy Drew series (and created by one of the primary Nancy Drew writers), Penny is a plucky girl reporter whose nose for trouble always leads to a new mystery.
author: Mildred A. Wirt
